channel.title: Shooting to the 9'th teleport disables your weapons
channel.description: Literally! The 9'th teleport is broken. You die instantly if you decide to go through it. But if you shoot there (throught a grenade, use alien weapon, launch rocket) your weapons will disappear totally!
